name: Two Kinds of Particles
description:
You control two special kinds of particles.  These are a particle of positive matter (black cube) and a particle of negative matter(white cube).  Both of these particles must protect each other if they are to survive the sea of particles.

If the positive matter comes into contact with any other particles of positive matter it is game over (Black v. Black).  Same with negative matter (White v. White).  However, if your positive matter particle(Black) hits a negative matter particle (White) it will destroy it (Black v. White).  Same if your positive matter hits some negative matter (White v. Black).

You gain one point for every enemy you defeat and lose one life every time you are hit.  See how long you can last in the chaos.  

Summary --------------------------

(Black v. Black) or (White v. White) Bad

(Black v. White) or (White v. Black) Good

Goal -------------------------------

Survive as long as you can and get the highest score possible.  

Controls -------------------------

Control ______________________(Keyboard/mouse) [Gamepad]

Move White Particle _______(WASD) [Left stick]

Move Black Particle________(Arrows)[Right stick]

Credits ---------------------------

Github repo : https://github.com/Digx7/Cranberry_Jam

Main Dev : Digx7 (me)

This game was made for the 2020 Cranberry Jam hosted by the VGDC club at CSUF.

This was made for a 24 hour game jam and took 10 hours to make

Music :

Infected Mushroom - Head of NASA [Monstercat LP Release] (Youtube) https://youtu.be/PKAeXBCLcUY

Space Buddha - Mental Hotline (Youtube) https://youtu.be/_9Kw8oKh94M
